Fourteen years ago the world became a little dimmer when Coretta Scott King passed away. But when I look at the world around us & the challenges we have to overcome, I am frequently reminded of her words, "Freedom is never really won. You earn it & win it in every generation."

Let’s be real clear: even if Trump wanted to claim he’s been exonerated after the trial, there cannot be a true acquittal if there hasn’t been a fair trial. 

We need witnesses.
We need documents.

Anything less doesn’t constitute a fair trial and fair process.
